title: ElarA nAtO
sahitya:
ElarA nAtO calamu krSNa


anupallavi

  ElarA I bAdha tALajAlarA dayajUDa nI


caraNam 1    shrI ramAlOla nannu brOva bhAramA ninu nammina nApai 
nEramA nannE cEdhiya padurumA nIku gabhIramA
    caraNam 2    shrIsha mAyiNTanuNTa prayAsamA nanu pAlincitE 
dOsamA palumAru vETaga rOsamA nI kAyAsamA
    caraNam 3    dEvara gOpAladAsuni kAvara callaganu mammu 
brOvarA nI prApu kOriti mAvarA mAkEmi dOvarA
